title: Mots' Mansion [videogame trailer]
abstract: Can you solve the mysteries within Grandma's house? (Special Mention in the Middle Videogame category).
description: Special Mention in the Middle Videogame category. Sam, Bec and their Mother move in to Grandma's house. But when Bec is captured, Sam needs to complete tasks given to him by the mysterious MOTS. Can he trust the Man on the Stairs and will they both make it out. In the end, the choices you make will matter.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003253; 'Screen It' 2016 [winning entries and special mentions]; Active; 2016
